trans-unit.source: Uninstall the tool and remove it from the local tool manifest.
trans-unit.target: Uninstall the tool and remove it from the local tool manifest.

trans-unit.source: Specifying the tool manifest (--tool-manifest) is only valid with the local option (--local or the default).
trans-unit.target: Specifying the tool manifest (--tool-manifest) is only valid with the local option (--local or the default).

trans-unit.source: The NuGet Package Id of the tool to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: 要卸载的工具的 NuGet 包 ID。

trans-unit.source: Uninstall a global tool or local tool.
trans-unit.target: 从当前开发环境中卸载工具。

trans-unit.source: Please specify one tool Package Id to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: 请指定一个要卸载的工具包 ID。

trans-unit.source: Uninstall the tool from the current user's tools directory.
trans-unit.target: 从当前用户的工具目录中卸载该工具。

trans-unit.source: Tool '{0}' was successfully uninstalled and removed from manifest file {1}.
trans-unit.target: Tool '{0}' was successfully uninstalled and removed from manifest file {1}.

trans-unit.source: Tool '{0}' has multiple versions installed and cannot be uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 工具“{0}”已安装多个版本，无法卸载。

trans-unit.source: The local option(--local), the global option (--global), the tool path option (--tool-path), can only have one at a time. Please specify only one of the options: {0}.
trans-unit.target: The local option(--local), the global option (--global), the tool path option (--tool-path), can only have one at a time. Please specify only one of the options: {0}.

trans-unit.source: The directory containing the tool to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: 包含要卸载的工具的目录。
